analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x3558cf08f9f6b91918a015acc2959454208b35a8.sol:
	Contract WFTToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0x3558cf08f9f6b91918a015acc2959454208b35a8.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0x3558cf08f9f6b91918a015acc2959454208b35a8.sol#72-73) is not in mixedCase
